title: Scalped: Trail's End
description: Fifteen years ago, Dashiell "Dash" Bad Horse ran away from a life of poverty and hopelessness on the Prairie Rose Indian Reservation in search of something better. Now he's come back home armed with nothing but a set of nunchuks, a hell-bent-for leather attitude and one dark secret, to find nothing much has changed on "the Rez"â€”short of a glimmering new casino run by a corrupt leader named Red Crow, and a once-proud people overcome by drugs and organized crime.The final volume of the series brings together all the threads laid out from the very beginning for a dramatic conclusion years in the making!Collects: Scalped #56-60.
author: Jason Aaron
